channel.title: What drew you to private servers in the first place?
channel.description:
The title is pretty self explanatory. Mainly due to all the diversity here I was just curious as to how so many different people came together. How did you find out about them in the first place?
As for me, I was in my freshman year of high school and I saw a kid fighting barrows, and I was amazed that he was maxed out combat (because I thought it was Runescape, at the time I had no clue that private servers even existed.) So he introduced me to the server that happened to be Near Reality during its beginning years.

item.title: What drew you to private servers in the first place?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I believe the first time I tried out private servers was when another player on RuneScape told me about them. At first, I thought he was trying to phish my password or something, but it turned out to be an actual private server. I kind of regret that moment, because it made me lose my ambition for playing RuneScape, but I would not be a part of this amazing community if it weren’t for it.

Read full topic
item.source: What drew you to private servers in the first place?

item.title: What drew you to private servers in the first place?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:15, topic:539204”][quote author=Docent link=topic=658036.msg4401727#msg4401727 date=1390794763]

[quote author=Vain_ link=topic=658036.msg4401707#msg4401707 date=1390792850]

My friend Tony showed me moparscape back in 2009, I thought it was a virus immediately and never bothered to play it, (I was really skeptical at that age) and basically after EoC fudgeed up my 10hp mage pure, I was like “why not make my dad happy and learn java as well as playing the best game i’ve ever played”
[/quote]i still have a 10hp pure

Aw ;’( fudgeing jagex messed up my life. I had 92 magic, all achieved in F2P
[/quote]i have 99 magic and 40 something range or so. would post a picture but i cbf to use my old laptop and can’t remember JAG questions for my new one.

figured it out, and apparently I’ve still been paying for membership :l

[/quote]

Lol nice, and I had like 34 strength instead of range

Read full topic
item.source: What drew you to private servers in the first place?

item.title: What drew you to private servers in the first place?
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

A friend originally told me about it back in 2006 or 2007? I was bored one day and eventually stumbled across this website and ended up downloading the moparscape client and would play on the built in hybridscape server (believe thats the name?) that it came with. Eventually I learned how to connect to other servers, and I remember the first server I ever played was probably the best server i’ve ever played lol. If i recall correctly, you would login with robin hat, dragon chainbody/legs, ranger boots, barrow gloves, fire cape, abyssal whip, dragon square, fury. You would hit the dummies for attack exp, the doors for strength xp, the haystacks for defence xp, the bookcases for magic xp, the rounded target things for ranging XP. In the quest tab, there would be options to spawn stuff, like barrows, runes (even though spells didn’t require you to use runes), and some other stuff. In the emotes tab, there would be options to teleport around, like mages bank, and all. There was another server I recall playing which was pretty fun too, you would alch robin hats noted for money, but I believe not a lot of people knew about that, and I recall always buying phat sets off of staff from alching those robin hats noted. I also remember camping at the lesser demon which was in Crandor, it would drop rune claws which would hit extremely high i believe? or would hit like 2-3 times at once, forgot was quite a while back, was a pretty fun server, but none of these servers lasted long before the owner shut them down.

Read full topic
item.source: What drew you to private servers in the first place?

Aw ;’( fudgeing jagex messed up my life. I had 92 magic, all achieved in F2P[/quote]i have 99 magic and 40 something range or so. would post a picture but i cbf to use my old laptop and can’t remember JAG questions for my new one.

figured it out, and apparently I’ve still been paying for membership :l

item.source: What drew you to private servers in the first place?

item.title: What drew you to private servers in the first place?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I was pretty young when I started runescape (I think like 5-6) and I really didn’t understand how to play or use Google. I hated losing, and I loved cheating. So I started searching things like “how to cheat on runescape” or similar, and eventually I came across a small client called the moparscape client. You could spawn every item, had all 99s, and it was awesome for me at the time.

Read full topic
item.source: What drew you to private servers in the first place?

item.title: What drew you to private servers in the first place?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

My friend Tony showed me moparscape back in 2009, I thought it was a virus immediately and never bothered to play it, (I was really skeptical at that age) and basically after EoC fucked up my 10hp mage pure, I was like “why not make my dad happy and learn java as well as playing the best game i’ve ever played”

Read full topic

item.source: What drew you to private servers in the first place?

item.title: What drew you to private servers in the first place?
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

Out of curiosity, I knew that other gaming communities had private servers running and was curious if anyone made a private server for Runescape, so I Google’d it and ended up here. Learned how to run, and edit minor things, as well as hosted my first winterlove server. Training on haystacks, doors, and dummies. It was a fun experience, and viola as the community grew, I grew.

Read full topic
item.source: What drew you to private servers in the first place?

item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

i think i heard about frugooscape way back when, then i tried it and i loved it so i stuck with the rsps scene and even tried my hand at hosting my own servers

I’ve been in the scene since I was 9 or 10 (2007-2008) and eventually registered here in 2010

Read full topic

item.title: What drew you to private servers in the first place?
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

I was playing runescape one day, was pking in f2p, got extremely angry that I died and lost my rune2h (my baby). I heard someone talking about a private server in rs, searched it and found one. Fell in love, then a player recruited me to his hamachi server and I registered an account here to ask for help back in summer of 2011.

Read full topic
